highlights__content1: From May 21 to 23, C2 will be dropping anchor at the Grand Quay of the Port of Montréal, an exceptional location for inspiration and real connections with your future business partners.
highlights__content2: Take advantage of the Early Bird rate: 30% off our 3-day passes, for a very limited time.
highlights__content3: The crucial conversation held between Yoshua Bengio and Yuval Noah Harari is now available to everyone on YouTube.
highlights__title3: Artificial Intelligence, Democracy, & the Future of Civilization
homeBraindates__copy: Enough of prim and proper pitches, 180-degree turns and unidirectional ideas. This year, it's your stories, your points of view that will be at the heart of our experiences. These combined perspectives will happen live as we launch new formats that feature participation, improvisation and interaction.
homeBraindates__title: When we combine different lenses, a new world takes shape.
homeHero__highlight-copy: C2 Montréal meaningfully connects people and organizations from diverse backgrounds, fields and industries in order to drive development in all its forms. We believe that society is at the heart of business. Which is why we put people's stories and perspectives at the centre of the conversation.
homeHero__highlight-title: C2MTL 2024 at the Grand Quay of the Port of Montréal
homeStats__copy1: Each year, C2MTL welcomes over 5,000 attendees to its three-day immersive playground that's part conference, part festival and part participatory experience.
homeStats__copy2: Our participants hail from over 50 countries, bringing with them their own unique experiences, expertise and points of view.
homeStats__copy3: Handpicked for being leaders, experts, innovators and change-makers in their fields, C2MTL brings over 100 speakers and personalities to each edition.
homeStats__copy4: From the startup scene to multinational conglomerates, C2MTL participants represent over 1,000 companies worldwide.
navigation__tickets-copy1: Conquer FOMO with a C2MTL 3-day pass to all the onstage action.
navigation__tickets-copy2: Don't miss a thing with a 3-day C2MTL pass giving you access to all conferences, networking activities and immersive collaborative experiences.
navigation__tickets-copy3: One-day C2MTL pass dedicated to your industry, giving you access to all conferences, networking activities and immersive collaborative experiences.
speakerModal__bio1s1: Tony Hawk was just nine years old when his brother gave him his first skateboard. By 14, he'd turned pro, and by 16 he was widely considered the best skateboarder on Earth. In 1999, he became the first skater to ever complete a 900, and shortly thereafter he launched Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, his now billion-dollar video game franchise. The Hawk empire now includes Birdhouse Skateboards, Hawk Clothing and the Tony Hawk Signature Series products, as well as his production company, 900 Films.
speakerModal__bio1s2: Attorney Laura Allison Wasser is an author, entrepreneur and family law expert. She is a Principal and Managing Partner at Wasser, Cooperman & Mandles, P.C., and the Chief of Divorce Evolution of the online divorce platform Divorce.com.
speakerModal__bio1s3: Recognized worldwide as one of the leading experts in artificial intelligence, Yoshua Bengio is best known for his pioneering work in deep learning, earning him the 2018 A.M. Turing Award, “the Nobel Prize of Computing,” with Geoffrey Hinton and Yann LeCun.
speakerModal__bio2s1: In 2022, a biographical documentary film titled Tony Hawk: Until the Wheels Fall Off, by award-winning director Sam Jones, debuted on HBO, giving an in-depth look at Tony's legendary career and personal life. Tony also founded The Skatepark Project, which helps underserved communities create safe and inclusive skateparks for youth.
speakerModal__bio2s2: Laura has represented celebrities like Kim Kardashian, Ryan Reynolds, Angelina Jolie, Johnny Depp, Jimmy Iovine, Maria Shriver and Stevie Wonder, but she maintains that divorce is the great equalizer — it terrifies everyone. Laura has made it her mission to change that through her work with Divorce.com, which gives divorcing couples an accessible and affordable resource to dissolve their marriage. By simplifying the divorce process online and sharing her vast experience in family law with her audiences, couples are empowered to reclaim control over their own destinies.
speakerModal__bio2s3: He is a Full Professor at Université de Montréal, and the Founder and Scientific Director of Mila - Quebec AI Institute. He co-directs the CIFAR Learning in Machines & Brains program as Senior Fellow, and acts as Scientific Director of IVADO.
speakerModal__bio3s2: In 2013, Laura authored the New York Times best-seller It Doesn't Have to Be That Way: How to Divorce Without Destroying Your Family and Bankrupting Yourself.
speakerModal__bio3s3: In 2019, he was awarded the prestigious Killam Prize, and in 2022 became the computer scientist with the highest h-index in the world. He is a Fellow of both the Royal Society of London and Canada, Knight of the Legion of Honor of France and Officer of the Order of Canada.
speakerModal__bio4s3: Concerned about the social impact of AI and the objective that AI benefits all, he actively contributed to the Montreal Declaration for the Responsible Development of Artificial Intelligence
